001package com.github.sormuras.bach.builder;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import java.util.StringJoiner;
009
010/** Contains methods creating new builder instances, e.g. building conventional Java projects. */
011public record BuilderFactory(Bach bach) {
012
013  public Conventional.Builder conventional(String... modules) {
014    if (modules.length == 0) throw new IllegalArgumentException("modules array must not be empty");
015
016    var unnamedSpace =
017        new Conventional.Space(
018            Optional.empty(), List.of(modules), List.of("."), List.of(), Path.of("modules"));
019    return new Conventional.Builder(bach, unnamedSpace);
020  }
021
022  public Conventional.Builder conventionalSpace(String name, String... modules) {
023    if (modules.length == 0) throw new IllegalArgumentException("modules array must not be empty");
024    if (name.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("name must not be empty");
025
026    var moduleSourcePather = new StringJoiner(File.separator).add(".").add("*").add(name);
027    var namedSpace =
028        new Conventional.Space(
029            Optional.of(name),
030            List.of(modules),
031            List.of(moduleSourcePather.toString(), moduleSourcePather.add("java").toString()),
032            List.of(),
033            Path.of(name, "modules"));
034    return new Conventional.Builder(bach, namedSpace);
035  }
036}
